Any Comments on it. :D

item.title: Account Following [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Tenen, post:29, topic:320480”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=416957.msg3129330#msg3129330 date=1266298292]
He’s done hardly anything. =\
My account, which was made about one month earlier, has 103m+ on it, the ability to smith addy, the ability to make almost all of the tradeable potions, etc.
[/quote]
tell me, does Smithing make money after a certain level, or is there a technique, etc? I’ve got to 50 but stopped since I found no (fast) profit.[/quote]
I strongly suggest smelting steel bars until 70; it’s a grind, but if you man up and do it then you’ll be able to superheat adamant bars.
If you buy your ingredients for the steel bars, you should wind up with at least 10m cash in the bank – buy addy/coal/natures when the prices are right, allowing you to either break even or profit when you sell the bars. Superheating 1k addy bars gives you 37.5k smithing experience and 53k magic experience. I believe you need to superheat something like 62k addy bars to reach 85 smithing.

[quote=“g-stringer, post:34, topic:320480”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=416957.msg3130160#msg3130160 date=1266411429]

Botted for sure.

myabe he’s the next Mopman and doesnt leave the house…

He’s done hardly anything. =\
My account, which was made about one month earlier, has 103m+ on it, the ability to smith addy, the ability to make almost all of the tradeable potions, etc.

Tell me your ways lothy

I clean herbs (I don’t bother with anything lower than irits – I aim for at least avantoe though) to level herblore.
I smelted steel bars.
After making around 8m from smelting I started flipping items and making money from trading.

That’s it.

you musta cleaned a lot of herbs to level…

Yeah. You can do over 100 a minute with properly configured mouse keys. That’s 1k experience per minute if you’re cleaning avantoe; 1.3k experience a minute if you do lantadyme. The experience really adds up if you buy and clean 10k of a herb at a time (which is essentially what I was doing).
[/quote]

Could you tell me how you configure your mouse keys when cleaning herbs ? sounds interesting.[/quote]
Check out a youtube video.

Read full topic
